item.description:
Do you want to meet new people? Do you like to socialize and network? Well the South Shore Dinning Meetup Group would like to give us all an opportunity to relax and have some fun. Our group is diverse, talkative, and very upbeat. Come out and see what its all about at The Cheesecake Factory at South Shore Plaza from 6-7:30pm. This meetup is a little different than most of our meetups. Since this is an appetizer social and we will be in the bar area, you are free to stop-in anytime during the times listed. If we're having fun we may stay later!

One of our organizers (Susan, Estella) will be there shortly before the start of the event to secure a bar table or two depending on the number of people planning to attend. We look forward to meeting all of you, enjoying some appetizers and drinks, and good conversation.

Appetizer Social Meetup!
The Cheesecake Factory
250 Granite Street/Route 37
South Shore Plaza
Braintree, MA 02184
781-843-1007
6-7:30pm

Event Fee: $2pp
Min/Max: No maximum at this time.
Guests: Bring yourself and a guest or 2....
Accessibility: This is handicap-accessible.
RSVP Deadline: Wednesday, February 6th @ 12noon
Event Organizers: Estella and Susan

Remember: Please bring cash. You are responsible for your portion of the bill including drinks, food, shared food, tax, and tip.

Directions:
The Cheesecake Factory is located next to the Main Entrance of the South Shore Plaza next to Legal Seafoods. Conveniently located off Exit 6 off Route 93, the South Shore Plaza is located at 250 Granite Street/Route 37. For more directions please go to http://www.simon.com/... or use mapquest.com or google maps.
item.how_to_find_us: We will have the Meetup tent and sign-in sheet at one of bar tables. Please look for us there!
item.why: For good appetizers and great conversation!

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Appetizers and Good Company - You!!
